attributes.action: Do not introduce discriminatory Covid Passports or vaccine doc domestically
attributes.additional_details:
As a member of the LGBTQ community we have grappled with enough to become equals. We are still not there. This would put us back. I should not have to go into detail for the British government to accept me for who I am, as well as any other gender.
Disabled people,the vulnerable,immigrants, all these people will suffer.Why not build a wall like Trump
It is discriminatory and it is not a scientific solution.
We all know the possibility of a double vaccine still allowing for contagion/transmission
attributes.background:
Vaccine passports will discriminate against the LGBTQ community. They will discriminate against the vulnerable, minorities, disabled.
They are a risk for loss of data protection.
With cases of double vaccinated people becoming infected, they are not fail safe, so should not be relied on.
